item.name: Used CPU for the last 5 minutes
Unused memory for the last 5 minutes
Used memory for the last 5 minutes

trigger_prototype.name: Operational status for sensor {#SNMPVALUE} is CRITICAL
Operational status for sensor {#SNMPVALUE} is FAILED
Operational status for sensor {#SNMPVALUE} is WARNING
Operational status for sensor {#SNMPVALUE} was changed

trigger.expression: ({Flexible Cisco DevMon:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)})>0.6*({Flexible Cisco DevMon:ciscoMemoryPoolFree.avg(600)}+{Flexible Cisco DevMon:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)}) and ({Flexible Cisco DevMon:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)})<0.7*({Flexible Cisco DevMon:ciscoMemoryPoolFree.avg(600)}+{Flexible Cisco DevMon:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)})
trigger.name: Memory usage exceeded 60%

trigger.expression: ({Flexible Cisco DevMon:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)})>0.7*({Flexible Cisco DevMon:ciscoMemoryPoolFree.avg(600)}+{Flexible Cisco DevMon:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)}) and ({Flexible Cisco DevMon:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)})<0.8*({Flexible Cisco DevMon:ciscoMemoryPoolFree.avg(600)}+{Flexible Cisco DevMon:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)})
trigger.name: Memory usage exceeded 70%
Packet loss detected on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Andrew removed this line too: {Template AMRI Cisco EnvMon:icmpping.avg(5m)}>0.4 and {Template AMRI Cisco EnvMon:icmppingloss.min(5m)}>20
